title: Weekly Note - Week 26 2025
summary: Major project development week with breakthrough improvements in Collapsi RL training system and completion of comprehensive academic documentation.
accomplishments: Achieved 54.7% win rate with mixed batch training for RL
Integrated MCTS, adding 200-400 Elo strength to game AI
Transformed academic papers into 300+ line technical documents
Overhauled Collapsi into a full RL system with web UI
Established foundation for Interactive CV project
Successfully integrated Obsidian with Claude Code using MCP server
Fixed Collapsi movement rules and implemented DFS pathfinding
Created polished web UI with 5 themes for Collapsi
Enhanced RL training with session timestamps and architecture preservation
insights: DFS pathfinding is effective for constrained movement on small boards
Mixed opponent pools prevent training plateaus
Monte Carlo returns are superior to GAE for short games
Session timestamps prevent checkpoint confusion in RL training
Movement rule flexibility significantly transforms game strategy
Modular architecture is essential for ML systems
learning: MCTS implementation patterns for two-player games
challenges: Initial game rule confusion cost time
MCTS performance overhead was significant (50x slower)
Missed daily notes early in the week
future_work: Full 1M episode training run for Collapsi
